strategy_reasoning: Using the cozy lo-fi aesthetic makes complex technical updates (API endpoints, billing logic, frontend refactors) feel like unlocking fun new items in a game. The pixel art style softens the 'tech' aspect, appealing to our creative, maker-focused audience.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art with chunky sprites, soft ambient lighting, and a mandatory lime green (#ecf874) accent. Nostalgic retro-gaming UI elements.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art close-up of the Pollinations Bee mascot wearing chunky retro headphones, bobbing its head. Floating 8-bit musical notes and speech bubbles transforming into text. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi chill vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'AUDIO SUITE UNLOCKED'. Nostalgic, cute, emotionally warm.
images.description: Visualizes the new Audio Suite capabilities (Music, TTS v3, Transcription) as a fun listening session.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene in a digital garden. The Pollinations Bee is high-fiving a cute, tiny 8-bit robot (Polly). Surrounded by pixelated flowers blooming. Background is a soft gradient of lime green (#ecf874) and peach. Retro game dialogue box at the bottom. Wholesome community vibes, like A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'MEET POLLY'.
images.description: Introduces Polly the Discord Bot as a new friend in the ecosystem.

images.prompt: Isometric pixel art workspace view. A tidy desk with a glowing CRT monitor showing a sleek, organized interface. A 'Level Up!' arrow floating above the screen. Soft lime green (#ecf874) glow effects. Clean lines, pastel colors (mint and cream). Represents the frontend redesign and image stability fixes. Cozy, inviting, productive atmosphere.
images.description: Showcases the frontend polish and stability fixes as a workspace upgrade.
